short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xtract is a powerful AI-driven Chrome extension that revolutionizes how you interact with web content, powered by Google's Geminiâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Xtract is a powerful AI-driven Chrome extension that revolutionizes how you interact with web content, powered by Google's Gemini AI technology. Transform any webpage, image, or video content into actionable insights with exceptional accuracy.

Key Features:
- High-Precision Text Extraction: Industry-leading accuracy in extracting text from any visual content
- Quick Snip Tool: Use Alt + S shortcut or the quick access icon for instant screen capture and analysis
- Gemini AI Integration: Connect your Gemini API key for AI capabilities
- Multi-Language Support: Extract and process text across multiple languages.
- Smart Data Analysis: Convert raw data into visualized insights and graphs automatically
- AI-Powered Chat: Have intelligent conversations about extracted content
- Visual Recognition: Identify and provide context about content in images and videos

Powerful Shortcuts & Access:
- Alt + S: Quick activation of snip tool
- Quick access icon in toolbar
- Instant results with minimal processing time

Perfect for:
- Students extracting information from research materials
- Professionals analyzing data from web content
- Researchers gathering information from multiple sources
- Content creators extracting quotes and references
- Anyone looking to streamline their web research process

How It Works:
1. Set up your Gemini API key once for AI features
2. Use Alt + S or click the snip tool icon to capture content
3. Select from multiple analysis options (Explain, Calculate, Summarize, Analyze)
4. Get instant, highly accurate results
5. Chat with AI about the extracted content for deeper understanding

Privacy & Security:
- Works locally within your browser
- Secure API key handling
- No data storage or collection
- Privacy-focused design

Technical Specifications:
- Lightweight extension (minimal browser impact)
- Compatible with all modern websites
- Seamless browser integration
- Lightning-fast response time
- Exceptional extraction accuracy

Transform your browsing experience with Xtract - where precision meets intelligence.
Download now and unlock the power of highly accurate, AI-driven web content analysis!
